Name: Story of the Survivor : Prisoner
About the game: Story of the Survivor Prisoner is a Action RPG Game than takes place during a zombie apocalypse. The world is dead and now there is no one to stop you from escaping the Prison.... or is it? Follow the story of Steve and his prison mates as they try to make their way to freedom. Use your thief skills to open lockers and doors to gain some useful items, create new weapons with crafting system. But as always remember zombies aren't the only thing you should watch out for. Featuers : 3 Playable Characters 250 Items 60 Weapons Bosses Crafting Hunger and Thirst System Your Mission is Escape from Prison Full of Zombies!
